summary: Completed testing of refactored Passages de Grades feature with Dan grades. Backend: 17/17 tests PASSED. Frontend: All features working - Kyu/Dan tabs, grade cards, dedicated detail page, technique table, navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: PassagesGradesViewer component properly implements tabs for Kyu/Dan filtering
API correctly returns 10 grades (6 Kyu + 4 Dan) with type_grade field
Type filter parameter (?type=kyu or ?type=dan) works correctly
GradeDetailPage component shows structured technique table grouped by attack
All Dan grades (Shodan, Nidan, Sandan, Yondan) have correct data and black belt color
Navigation between list and detail views works correctly with back button
data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: None - uses static PROGRAMME_FFAAA data from backend models
context_for_next_testing_agent: Passages de Grades feature fully tested with Dan grades. Backend API at /api/grades/programme returns 10 grades (6 Kyu + 4 Dan). Type filter works: ?type=kyu returns 6, ?type=dan returns 4. Frontend accessible via Admin > Espace de gestion (password: aikido2024) > Sports > Aikido > Passages de Grades. Tabs switch between Kyu and Dan grades. Clicking a grade card opens dedicated detail page with technique table. Back button returns to list.

GET /api/grades/programme.details: Returns list of 10 grades (6 Kyu + 4 Dan) with type_grade field

GET /api/grades/programme?type=dan.details: Returns 4 Dan grades (shodan, nidan, sandan, yondan)

GET /api/grades/programme/shodan.details: Returns Shodan details with 13 techniques, 2 mouvements, 300h minimum

navigation_to_passages_grades.path: Administration > Espace de gestion > Sports > Aikido > Passages de Grades

back_navigation.details: Back button returns to grade list correctly

screenshots: .screenshots/08_passages_grades.png - Passages de Grades with Kyu grades
.screenshots/09_grades_dan.png - Dan grades tab with 4 black belt grades
